mapper.select: select ROOM_ID roomId, ROOM_RANK_NAME roomRankName, BED_NAME bedName, VIEW_NAME viewName, ROOM_SIZE roomSize from ROOM where DELETE_STATUS ='N'
SELECT MAX(room_ID) + 1 AS roomId FROM ROOM WHERE ROOM_ID LIKE CONCAT(#{selectedRoomFloor}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM (ROOM_ID, ROOM_RANK_CODE, ROOM_RANK_NAME, ROOM_SIZE, ROOM_BASIC_CAPACITY, ROOM_MAX_CAPACITY, ROOM_BASIC_PRICE, VIEW_CODE, VIEW_NAME, ROOM_ADD_PRICE, BED_CODE, BED_NAME, BED_CNT) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{roomRankCode}, #{roomRankName}, #{roomSize}, #{roomBasicCapacity}, #{roomMaxCapacity}, #{roomBasicPrice}, #{viewCode}, #{viewName}, #{roomAddPrice}, #{bedCode}, #{bedName}, #{bedCnt})
